channel.title: Help with Item.Java
channel.description:
I modified my Item.java to fit the current Silab Items. I've added all of what i think should be in there. After I configured it, compiled it, and got 8 errors.
These are the errors I get
And I get these errors when I compile.
[code]Item.java:163: cannot find symbol symbol : variable capes location: class Item return capes[(int)(Math.random()*capes.length)]; ^ Item.java:163: cannot find symbol symbol : variable capes location: class Item return capes[(int)(Math.random()*capes.length)]; ^ Item.java:167: cannot find symbol symbol : variable boots location: class Item return boots[(int)(Math.random()*boots.length)]; ^ Item.java:167: cannot find symbol symbol : variable boots location: class Item return boots[(int)(Math.random()*boots.length)]; ^ Item.java:171: cannot find symbol symbol : variable gloves location: class Item return gloves[(int)(Math.random()*gloves.length)]; ^ Item.java:171: cannot find symbol symbol : variable gloves location: class Item return gloves[(int)(Math.random()*gloves.length)]; ^ Item.java:175: cannot find symbol symbol : variable shields location: class Item return shields[(int)(Math.random()*shields.length)]; ^ Item.java:175: cannot find symbol symbol : variable shields location: class Item return shields[(int)(Math.random()*shields.length)]; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 8 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Anyone know what I did wrong?

item.title: Help with Item.Java
item.dc:creator: @xCrackingx xCrackingx
item.description:
@xCrackingx wrote:

I’ve figured it out, thanks to those who helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Item.Java
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

your missing the varibles capes,boots,gloves and shields.i think there ints but im too tired to tell

hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Item.Java
item.dc:creator: @xCrackingx xCrackingx
item.description:
@xCrackingx wrote:

I modified my Item.java to fit the current Silab Items. I’ve added all of what i think should be in there. After I configured it, compiled it, and got 8 errors.

These are the errors I get

And I get these errors when I compile.

Item.java:163: cannot find symbol symbol : variable capes location: class Item return capes[(int)(Math.random()*capes.length)]; ^ Item.java:163: cannot find symbol symbol : variable capes location: class Item return capes[(int)(Math.random()*capes.length)]; ^ Item.java:167: cannot find symbol symbol : variable boots location: class Item return boots[(int)(Math.random()*boots.length)]; ^ Item.java:167: cannot find symbol symbol : variable boots location: class Item return boots[(int)(Math.random()*boots.length)]; ^ Item.java:171: cannot find symbol symbol : variable gloves location: class Item return gloves[(int)(Math.random()*gloves.length)]; ^ Item.java:171: cannot find symbol symbol : variable gloves location: class Item return gloves[(int)(Math.random()*gloves.length)]; ^ Item.java:175: cannot find symbol symbol : variable shields location: class Item return shields[(int)(Math.random()*shields.length)]; ^ Item.java:175: cannot find symbol symbol : variable shields location: class Item return shields[(int)(Math.random()*shields.length)]; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 8 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Anyone know what I did wrong?
